titleInfo.title: Kitāb al-tadhkirah fī al-hay’ah كتاب التذكرة في الهيئة Ṭūsī, Naṣīr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad طوسي، نصير الدين محمد بن محمد and al-Tabṣirah fī ʿilm al-hayʾah التبصرة في علم الهيئة Kharaqī, ʻAbd al-Jabbār ibn ʻAbd al-Jabbār خرقي، عبد الجبار بن عبد الجبار

physicalDescription.extent: Material: Eastern laid paperDimensions: 335 x 210 mm leaf [275 x 140 (item 1: ff. 2r-60v), 265 x 145 mm written (item 2: ff. 61r-110r)]Foliation: Eastern Arabic foliation in black ink; British Museum foliation in pencil; mid-quire marks (quinions) in the form of a small circle (or Eastern Arabic numeral 5) in upper left-hand corners of mid-quire versosRuling: Misṭarah; 15 lines per page (item 1: ff. 2r-60v), 17 lines per page (item 2: ff. 61r-110r); vertical spacing 6 lines per 10 cm (item 1: ff. 2r-60v), vertical spacing 7 lines per 10 cm (item 2: ff. 61r-110r)Script: Naskh; the scribe (of at least item 2: ff. 61v-110r) is Muḥammad Riḍā ibn ‘Azīz Allāh al-Tūnī (محمد رضا ابن عزيز الله التوني, f. 110r, lines 12-13)Ink: Black ink, with rubricated headings, overlinings and diagrams in redBinding: Black leather binding with red leather spine and blind-tooled border and medallionCondition: Minor water stains worse towards front of volumeMarginalia: Very fewSeals: ff. 2r, 60v, 61v and 110r

mods.abstract: Two treatises on astronomy.Contents:(1) al-Ṭūsī (الطوسي) Kitāb al-tadhkirah fī al-hay’ah(كتاب التذكرة في الهيئة; ff. 2r-60v);(2) al-Kharaqī (الخرقي), al-Tabṣirah fī ‘ilm al-hay’ah(التبصرة في علم الهيئة; ff. 61r-110r);The copy was completed in 1107/1695-96 by Muḥammad Riḍā ibn ‘Azīz Allāh al-Tūnī (محمد رضا ابن عزيز الله التوني, see scribe's colophon, f. 110r, lines 12-13).
